turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can I get three small pizzas from Bella Luna all with thick crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: olives el peppers on all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 small thick crust pizzas, with spinach, olives, and bell peppers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $39, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Can I get it for delivery, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, please note that your order does not include tip.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be delivered within 45 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all. Thank you very much.
